item.title: 2020, you won't be missed
item.description: This by far the worst year in generations is coming to a close. It won't be missed, yet it will remain in our memory, history books, and our shared trauma will take decades to heal. Here's to 2021, hopefully, a better year.

Yet its main purpose - it's a blog, damn it! - happens to be mostly neglected.
